title: IT Engineer Intern
description: Worked on IT engineering, hardware–software integration, and automation systems. Built and deployed a fully functional website and contributed to AI/ML, embedded systems, and industrial automation projects.
achievements: Built a complete website integrated with hardware systems for live data interaction
Contributed to IT, AI/ML, embedded systems, and automation solutions for the Vantara Animal Kingdom project at Reliance Refineries
Assisted with software development, troubleshooting, and electronics circuit design
Received a Letter of Recommendation for exceptional technical contributions

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Worked on high-impact digital marketing campaigns, content creation, and brand outreach. Contributed to lead generation, competitor analysis, and PR content development.
achievements: Designed and delivered 15+ marketing creatives aligned with brand goals
Authored 4 PR articles and contributed 30+ SEO backlinks
Conducted competitor analysis and built structured marketing frameworks
Led organic lead generation on LinkedIn and Facebook
Received a Letter of Recommendation for outstanding performance

title: Web Development Intern
description: Gained hands-on experience in web development, SEO, content creation, and digital optimization. Worked on product descriptions, blogs, and multiple live development projects.
achievements: Optimised 100+ product descriptions and 30+ blog posts improving SEO performance by 15%
Contributed to 5 live web development projects with the senior team
Enhanced user engagement by 20% through content and SEO improvements
Received a Letter of Completion for successful completion of internship

title: Digital Marketing Intern
description: Contributed to animal welfare campaigns by managing donor outreach, fundraising, and social media marketing efforts.
achievements: Helped raise approx ₹10,000 for animal care initiatives
Engaged 1000+ donors through online outreach
Created content for marketing campaigns and social awareness
Received a Letter of Recommendation for impactful contributions

title: Teacher Assistant
description: Supported students academically through one-on-one sessions, evaluation, and curriculum assistance.
achievements: Evaluated 20+ question papers ensuring fair student assessments
Mentored 30+ students improving comprehension by 15%–30%
Assisted in curriculum planning and topic selection
Received a Letter of Recommendation for strong teaching contributions

title: Events Team Member & Secretary
company: E-Cell, Fr. C. Rodrigues Institute of Technology
description: Managing entrepreneurship-focused events, mentoring juniors, coordinating communication, and leading strategic collaborations for the institute’s entrepreneurship cell.
achievements: Planned and executed major events including Spark-A-Thon and E-Summit 2025
Led communication, documentation, and team coordination activities
Guided new team members and supported early-stage startup ideation
